title: Pagetype freestyle content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'freestyle'

name.description: The unique name of this question. This is the identifier in the saved Data

style.description: The css styles of the wrapping element of the page, which fills the whole screen. Example: 'background: black; display: flex;'

html.description: The inner html to be added to the wrapping element. Can be any html and css styles.
